mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CODE WHERE G_CD = #{G_CD} AND CD = #{CD}

SELECT * FROM Nutrient n WHERE DESC_KOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{DESC_KOR}, '%')
ORDER by CAST(NUTR_CONT1 AS UNSIGNED) DESC limit 0,5

SELECT * FROM Nutrient n WHERE DESC_KOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{DESC_KOR}, '%')
ORDER by CAST(NUTR_CONT2 AS UNSIGNED) DESC limit 0,5

SELECT * FROM Nutrient n WHERE DESC_KOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{DESC_KOR}, '%')
ORDER by CAST(NUTR_CONT3 AS UNSIGNED) DESC limit 0,5

SELECT * FROM Nutrient n WHERE DESC_KOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{DESC_KOR}, '%')
ORDER by CAST(NUTR_CONT4 AS UNSIGNED) DESC limit 0,5
